version_description:
• Added support for the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
• Improved reliability of location-based search
• Improved VoiceOver experience
• Bug fixes

• Added support for the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
• Improved reliability of location-based search
• Improved VoiceOver experience
• Bug fixes
• Added a link to the age admittance policy.
• Added a link to the age admittance policy.

• Now you can access and enjoy Regal specials & promotions.
• Improved the related Tweets view, so that it loads more content as you scroll.
• Fixed some bugs and crashes.

• Now you can access and enjoy Regal specials & promotions.

• Fixed some bugs and crashes.
• Fix for issue entering phone number when creating a new account
• Fix for issue entering phone number when creating a new account

It's easier than ever to sign in and create a Regal Crown Club account. Get started today to start earning rewards for watching movies!

Find movie showtimes and purchase tickets on-the-go for nearby Regal Cinemas, Edwards and United Artists theatres with the official Regal Cinemas app. You can always enjoy the following features:
● GET MOVIES SHOWTIMES
● PURCHASE TICKETS
● FIND NEARBY THEATRE LOCATIONS
● EARN REWARDS WITH THE REGAL CROWN CLUB

Movie lovers! We have some updates for you.

Joining the Regal Crown Club is easier than ever! We have a speedier sign up process, so you can stop typing and start earning rewards from your purchases.

You can now connect your Disney Rewards account. This will let you automatically earn your Disney Rewards from Disney movie tickets you buy through the Regal app!

Thanks for choosing Regal!

Ticketing now takes place completely within the app, for a more seamless experience! This means you can:
- Pay more quickly with Apple Pay.
- Get your Regal Crown Club points each time you buy tickets because you’re already logged in!
- Use your app to get into the theatre.
- Store your tickets in Apple Wallet.

Ticketing now takes place completely within the app, for a more seamless experience! This means you can:
- Pay more quickly with Apple Pay.
- Get your Regal Crown Club points each time you buy tickets because you’re already logged in!
- Use your app to get into the theatre.
- Store your tickets in Apple Wallet.

Now you can use the app to:
• Get refunds for ticket purchases.
• Get Regal Crown Club credits after you visit the concession counter or box office by entering the claim codes on your receipt.
• See the number of times you’ve visited the movies in the past year.
• See your lifetime Regal Crown Club credits.

Thanks for choosing Regal!

• See your lifetime Regal Crown Club credits.

Thanks for choosing Regal!
When you click "Shop Online" from your Regal Crown Club screen, you'll now be logged in to our online store automatically. Happy shopping!
When you click "Shop Online" from your Regal Crown Club screen, you'll now be logged in to our online store automatically. Happy shopping!
We have made it easier to see your lifetime credits earned. Show your friends who the real movie fan is.

Now as a Regal Crown Club member, you can customize the look of your card! Browse the Card Gallery and choose a design from your favorite movie.

Check back often, as we’ll be adding new designs to the Card Gallery from time to time!
We have made it easier to see your lifetime credits earned. Show your friends who the real movie fan is.

Now as a Regal Crown Club member, you can customize the look of your card! Browse the Card Gallery and choose a design from your favorite movie.

Check back often, as we’ll be adding new designs to the Card Gallery from time to time!

We’re excited to announce that we’ve added Series Passes!

In this app update, you will see the first-ever Series Pass, which will give you access to a select group of movies.

In honor of the best films of the past year, we’ve created a Series Pass that lets you catch all the Best Picture nominees at Regal. Grab your pass in the app today, and see all the year’s best!

We have made it easier to keep track of your credits and when they are going to expire. Don't miss out. Redeem your credits for rewards directly in the app!

We’re excited to announce that we’ve added Augmented Reality with Moviebill!

In this app update, use the power of your Regal camera for exciting new experiences with:
-Moviebill Magazine
-Posters
-Standees
-Banners

Your first-ever Moviebill will be released opening weekend of Avengers: Infinity War in Regal Cinemas locations.

This app update enhances the Moviebill AR experience, including:
- Ability to access previous editions and manage your collection 
- Easier photo/video sharing functions 
- New, faster loading screen

This update also improves the seat selection process.

This app update enhances the Moviebill AR experience, including:
- Ability to access previous editions and manage your collection 
- Easier photo/video sharing functions 
- New, faster loading screen

This update also improves the seat selection process.
Minor improvements and bug fixes.

Purchasing tickets on the app is now better than ever!  We’re excited to announce that you can now store and use gift cards for ticket purchases, as well as view gift card balances right in the app.

We’ve also made it easier for you to find out about special promotions on the movies you want to see.  Just look for the Promotion icon in the Now Playing list.   

Thanks for choosing Regal!

Thanks for choosing Regal!

Regal is taking Augmented Reality to a whole new level with updated AR experiences powered by Moviebill. Tap the Moviebill icon in the top right corner of the app to interact with 3D characters, unlock digital objects and, through state of the art technology, literally step inside the biggest upcoming movies.

Point the scanner at ANY movie poster for instant access to trailers, cast information, special promotions and specially tailored AR features designed to bring movies to life like never before.
 
Update your app today to summon a full scale Rev-9 from Terminator: Dark Fate and make sure to scan Regal's exclusive Terminator poster for a surprise experience that you'll find nowhere else!
Subscribe to Regal Unlimited and watch as many movies as you want for one low price only in the Regal app.
AR enhancements now allow you to take Woody and the gang on the road with you. Disney & Pixar’s Toy Story 4 opens June 21.

Enhancements and bug fixes

You can now use Regal gift cards as payment for Regal Unlimited™!
 
- Use Regal gift cards for Regal Unlimited™ sign-up initial payment (any plan)
- Use Regal gift cards for Regal Unlimited™ recurring payments 
- Easy payment card selection during ticket purchases/checkout
